text: Va [ej mu'minon] ʙo zanoni musrik to imon najovardaand, izdivoc nakuned; va ʙe gumon kanizi mu'min, az zani [ozodi] musrik ʙehtar ast; agarci [zeʙoi jo doroias] mavridi pisandaton voqe' gardad; va [zanoni musulmonro] ʙa izdivoci mardoni musrik darnajovared, magar on ki imon ʙijovarand; va hatman ʙardai mu'min az mardi [ozodi] musrik ʙehtar ast; agarci seftai [doroi va mavqeijati] u suda ʙosed. Onon ʙa suji otas [-i duzax] da'vat mekunand va Alloh taolo ʙa farmon [va tavfiq]-i xes ʙa suji ʙihist va omurzis da'vat mekunand va ojot [-u ahkomi] xudro ʙaroi mardum ravsan mesozad; ʙosad, ki pand girand
